item.title: Reduction (To Prove X is NP Complete)
item.description: Reduction (To Prove X is NP Complete) To prove $x$ is [[NP Complete]]: 1. Prove X is NP 2. Prove X is NP Hard Find a problem $y$ that is already [[NP Complete]].
